raw_answer:
The document states on page 3, in the paragraph following Figure 1: "Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35."

Since patient CII-3 from Family C is identified as carrying the p.D620N mutation (Table 1, page 3), this statement applies to CII-3. Therefore, according to the document, no second mutation in the exons of VPS35 was found for patient CII-3.
